blog.name: yoshinoritagi
blog.title: Yoshi
blog.description: Requests are currently open.

summary:
They've got little dick energy.
Celebrate the REAL ANTAGONIST THAT DESERVES EVERYTHING 
(bad and good)
The one who taught us...
body:
All these bitches celebrating Shigaraki… When he’s the main antagonist and has no chance of being dead….

They’ve got little dick energy.

Celebrate the REAL ANTAGONIST THAT DESERVES EVERYTHING

(bad and good)

The one who taught us that villains will do anything for their adopted families, are loyal to a God Damm fucking and are generally so fucking human.

They have backstories and motivations and a purpose, his was set in stone and yet, our fucker of a main antagonist crumbled that stone away outta pure spite and an unloyalty that’ll leave a major backlash on Kai forever. (If he isn’t dead, I mean)

Oh also all the arm jokes, mysophobia jokes, herosyndromephobia jokes, and literally anything dealing with his mask, that shits fucking funny I don’t care how sad it is, it’s always funny

Also also Shigaraki was just jealous that Kai was getting more attention from the heros, let’s be honest he did the same thing with Stain, petty bitch. Sure there was probably some incentive due to Mr. Compress’ arm and Magne but really, when has the loss of a member ever bothered him before? (Moonfish, Muscular, Mustard… Hey is it just me or do all the villains whose names begin with M get jailed or killed?)

Magne was apart of that exact same group, so what made her different? Nothing. Her quirk wasn’t anything special, and her hotheadedness got her killed. Literally nothing makes her different from any of the others and Shigaraki doesn’t even care that she died so quit acting like he was ‘quietly seething with rage’ or something. Just admit that your fave is a heartless bitch like the rest of us and move on.

~*There are worse things to fear then myself*~ 
Hello~ 
I'm Jay! I'm ???/panromantic, I'm an aspiring writer, I like drawing and making crafts.

summary:
Does this make anyone else...sad?
I mean, Shouji isn't scary, least not to me. Maybe a little intimidating when you first see...
body:
Does this make anyone else…sad?

I mean, Shouji isn’t scary, least not to me. Maybe a little intimidating when you first see him, but he has a fascinating quirk and we’ve seen that he cares for his friends, like when he stayed with Tokoyami after he lost control of Dark Shadow or in the anime when he burritoed and held Tsu to keep her warm.

He’s kind inside and the idea that he’s spent his life being feared by others before coming to UA and becoming part of the 1-A family just makes me wanna hug him.

blog.name: boku-no-hero-headcannons
blog.title: Welcome To BNHA Hell
blog.description:
My name’s Skye. I run this blog and

I’m just happy to be here tbh

——————

Requests (19) {CLOSED}

Matchups (6) {CLOSED}

——————

Insta: @skyebolina_cosplays

Primary Tumblr: @skyebolina

RULES

tags: btw i always write in gender neutral pronouns
it makes it easier for everyone to read them and relate
summary: Ya girl's on her period, so could I get some hcs of Tamaki, Iida, and Shinsou with a gf who's really touchy feely when she's on...
question: Ya girl's on her period, so could I get some hcs of Tamaki, Iida, and Shinsou with a gf who's really touchy feely when she's on her period? Just, cuddles and snuggles for hours after they wake up, literally stuck to their hip if they have to go out, and plenty of PDA
answer:
Ouch :(( i give you some headcanons in these troubling times. Hang in there! 

As always, gender pronouns are neutral!

Amajiki Tamaki

  • Tamaki is a very understanding, sensitive person and can relate quite well to what others are feeling, he thought he would be able to handle his s/o on their period. But he hadn’t anticipated just how many touches they craved. That was a curveball and a half.
  • He is a flustered boy at the best of times when his s/o is just near him, so when they start to throw themselves at him and want him to touch them pretty much 24/7, he can become a bit of a blushing mess. It’s all so much. 
  • Once he gets over the initial shock of his s/o’s craving for affection, he would slowly but surely become used to it and would settle into a good routine. He does still blush occasionally when his s/o snuggles into him and showers him in praise.
  • Even though it’s one of his ideas of hell, if his s/o needs sanitary towels/tampons, he will buy it for them. He will ask a lot of questions because he wants to know exactly which ones he’s getting for them and how much they’re gonna cost. He still freaks out when he goes to buy them though cause hahahaha anxiety.
  • If his s/o is having cramps, he’ll get them a hot water bottle and try and massage their sides to lessen the pain. He may not know much about what a period feels like, but, being one of the top students at UA, there have been times where he’s felt broken and battered from training and missions - he’s got a few remedies up his sleeve by now.  

Iida Tenya

  • Honestly is the most supportive person. His s/o needs a pad/tampon? He’ll go get one. Wants to cuddle? Sure. Wants to watch Disney movies and cry at Toy Story 3? Fine by this boy. 
  • He doesn’t mind the extra *cough cough* attention his s/o gives him. He does get quite embarrassed if they do it in class though because it’s kind of hard to be a model student when his s/o is all over him.
  • It’s always very easy for the rest of 1A to tell when his s/o is on their period because they’ll be very handsy with their class rep who will be more than a little red in the face.
  • His s/o’s favourite thing to do is lie on top of him because, hello, this boy is an actual giant teddy bear, while playing with his hair.  It’s so fun to play with the longer parts at the top of his head and running their hands over the buzzed part at the bottom.  
  • Iida does not approve of his s/o sneaking into his dorm room for impromptu sleepovers but, as an aspiring hero and loving boyfriend, he’ll do anything to make them happy. That includes letting them stay in his rooms to get some comforting hugs when they’re having bad cramps. 
  • When that happens he’s always the big spoon and likes to have them close to him. It’s soothing for both of them. 

Shinsou Hitoshi

  • Shinsou still isn’t used to the fact that he has someone who wants to be around him and who genuinely cares about him without worrying about his quirk. So when they start to get super touchy-feely with him and almost always have a hand on him, it sends him into overdrive. 
  • He’s a little bit touch starved. No one wants to touch the guy who can mind control you, right? So when his s/o does, it makes him indescribably happy. Even though he does feel kinda bad since it means that his s/o is on their period. 
  • He’s a bit awkward and he’s not really used to comforting people but he loves his s/o, so he tries for them. The longer they date, the better he becomes at consoling his s/o. He’s practically an expert now.
  • “If you keep trying to make out with me in class you’re gonna get us expelled, baby.”
  • His sleeping schedule sucks ass so in the mornings (because lucky him he’s a night owl and an early bird) he likes to watch his s/o peacefully sleep while snuggling into him. There’s nothing more reassuring than waking up to that, and it makes him want to work even harder knowing that they will be there for him on the other side.

summary: hey so I saw your request post and was wondering if you’d draw Shinsou?? I love my purple cabbage
question: hey so I saw your request post and was wondering if you’d draw Shinsou?? I love my purple cabbage
answer: i don’t know enough about him to do anything other than a boring ¾ to the left bust shot but he radiates goth energy and deserves a good nights sleep

blog.name: incorrectbnhaquotes
blog.title: season 3 amirite
blog.description: things that were 100% definitely said in boku no hero academia. not spoiler free. tracking the tag #incorrectbnhaquotes. submissions open!

summary:
Endeavor: [kills Noumu]
Shigaraki, watching him with binoculars from a water tank: wow
Endeavor, to Stain: I'm not going to kill...
body:
Endeavor: [kills Noumu]
Shigaraki, watching him with binoculars from a water tank: wow
Endeavor, to Stain: I'm not going to kill you, that would make me a murderer like you
Shigaraki, still watching with his binoculars: WOW

dialogue.name: Shigaraki, watching him with binoculars from a water tank
dialogue.label: Shigaraki, watching him with binoculars from a water tank:

dialogue.name: Endeavor, to Stain
dialogue.label: Endeavor, to Stain:
dialogue.phrase: I'm not going to kill you, that would make me a murderer like you

dialogue.name: Shigaraki, still watching with his binoculars
dialogue.label: Shigaraki, still watching with his binoculars:

blog.name: galacticjoelle
blog.title: Big Dumb Bitch
blog.description: I love having horror slashers in my ass, men and women alike and I like marvel and anime. I post mild nsfw once in a blue moon so beware. All “nsfw” is censored :) I also write sometimes ;) feel free to dm me about any ideas like one shots or x readers🖤

summary:
“I always thought I might be bad, now I’m sure that it’s true cuz, I think you’re so good and I’m nothing like you.”
I...
body:
“I always thought I might be bad, now I’m sure that it’s true cuz, I think you’re so good and I’m nothing like you.”

I sacrificed my back to Satan to finish the stippling :) I love how it turned out either way… I’m also thinking of writing a mini fic for this too! Dm me if you want to read it ;)
